definitions.definition: a series of letters, numbers, etc. that you must type into a computer or computer system in order to be able to use it

examples.text: Enter a username and password to get into the system.
Your mailbox can be password protected to ensure security.
a software tool developed by hackers to crack passwords

definitions.definition: a secret word or phrase that you need to know in order to be allowed into a place

examples.text: You must give the password before they'll let you in.
